name: Eisai Europe Ltd
membership:
European Federation of Pharmaceutical Industries and Associations
The Association of the British Pharmaceutical Industry
goal: Around the world there are still many diseases for which no effective treatments exist and many patients who do not have adequate access to the medicines they need. As a global pharmaceutical company addressing these unmet medical needs, Eisai is committed to making contributions to better healthcare for patients and their families around the world through its business activities.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation
